comment.author: 49503154593@N01
comment._content: This bridge, which opened in 1911, was restored (including some serious rebuilding) from 2003 to 2005. Here is a great article about the bridge's history.

comment.author: 10857425@N05
comment._content: grew up in Spokane and the bridge looks very much the same today! VERY COOL to see this!
